## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (6da2552e428aa0a3084e594bad25009163f9292c5905d5ae1eff319dc7450585)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'camera-kit-react-native-example' @ 1.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
